Title: Authorizes the village of North Haven to reduce the maximum speed limit along certain designated streets
Summary: Authorizes the village of North Haven, county of Suffolk, to reduce the maximum speed limit along certain designated streets in such village to not less than twenty miles per hour.
ActClause: AN ACT in relation to authorizing the village of North Haven, Suffolk county, to reduce the maximum speed limit along certain designated streets in such village to not less than 20 miles per hour
